alert.note: Alert for Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:32PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Oglethorpe and southeastern Madison Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 831 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Danielsville to near Lexington, and moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Comer, Colbert, Carlton, Smithonia, Watson Mill Bridge State Park, Vesta, Point Peter and Paoli. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
